name: Island monster toast
description:
Get ready for an explosive game with tons of tricky tasks loaded with bombs and tricky levels. Blow, bounce and use any means to get the tiny monster to land on base.

Use your brain and make sure you get the monster to land on base without touching ground.
You need to get him to the base onlu or else the task will be unvalid.

Make way through dozens of action packed level in this top notch arcade hero classic gametype anytime and anywhere.

No need for internet connection, no ads or in app purchases
just 100% arcade gaming like the good old days!
